channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 17:05 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 17:05 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Черкаська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 4:42 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Myriv territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community

item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291
